name: Cosmic Cadence (Kyoomei)
description:
2D Platformer Project for the Michigan State University Specialization in Game Design and Development. 

Modifications done over the base project:

  • Design of one full level
  • Creation of a new music track (Level1 Theme)
  • Implementation of a blinking effect on the player and boss upon taking damage
  • Added some variety to the enemies, including a boss

Note: The project will surely be updated, as this is just a time-constrained POC.

Created by Vladimir "Kyoomei" Romero

Level1 music by Vladimir "Kyoomei" Romero

Base code and assets provided by Michigan State University
